name: Bowlbo
storyline: One day a goofy boy named Bowlbo and his dog Bing Bing snuck out of his Mother's house and went outside to play, but they wondered in to the woods where they came across a scary evil and also very ugly Witch, whom stole the mutt away. Now Bowlbo must try and save his beloved pet.
summary: Bowlbo is a 2.5D platformer and is designed for speed running. The game is inspired by a platforming game called Tomba; which has a similar art style
